title: AI cheating accusations create trust issues in Michigan classrooms
description: When AI detection software fails, students and teachers have to negotiate difficult conversations about cheating with artificial intelligence.
content:
Research and Michigan educators say AI detection software meant to catch cheating students isn't effective.
Educators are instead coming up with other ways to grade and assess students.

title: SoftBank rushes to raise $22.5B to meet OpenAI funding deadline as AI compute costs surge
description: SoftBank Group is racing against the calendar to assemble the remaining $22.5 billion it owes OpenAI, with people familiar with the matter saying the funds must arrive before year-end. title: AI: The New Frontier in Medicine and Beyond
description: Artificial Intelligence is set to revolutionize human capabilities, particularly in medicine. Manish Gupta from Google DeepMind highlights its long-term potential, which remains underestimated. Google has announced significant investments in AI infrastructure in India, aiming to advance healthcare, agriculture, and education, while emphasizing responsible and balanced development.
content:
Artificial Intelligence is poised to transform human capabilities, especially in medical fields, according to Manish Gupta, Senior Director at Google DeepMind. He believes the long-term potential of AI is still underappreciated.
Amidst global discuss... [553 chars]

title: India tops global 'AI Advantage' index, far exceeds world average: EY Survey
description: India leads the global 'AI Advantage' score at 53 points, which is much higher than the world average of 34 points. This score shows the real impact of Artificial Intelligence at work by measuring how much time workers save, according to the EY 2025 Work Reimagined Survey.

title: China bets on AI to power its green transition
description: In the city of Chifeng in northern China, an ultra-modern factory owned by green-energy company Envision is making hydrogen and ammonia using renewable electricity, helped by artificial intelligence (AI).

title: The upskilling opportunity: Why AI PCs are key to workforce transformation
description: The promise and influence of artificial intelligence in the workplace is no longer theoretical.
